title.rendered: Lanmei Airlines in Phnom Penh, Cambodia

content.rendered:
Lanmei Airlines is a local Cambodia air transport company. “Lanmei” is an abbreviation for the Lancang-Mekong River. The Lancang River originates in Southwest China and becomes known as Mekong as it flows through Burma, Laos, Thailand, Cambodia, and Vietnam and into the South China Sea.

Verified & Updated on 4/3/21

Lanmei Airlines Contact Address, Phone, Email and Website

Lanmei Airlines Address : No.575 D&E, Russian Federation Boulevard, Phnom Penh, Cambodia

Phone number : +855 93466999, +855 93822999

Email: ticketing@lanmeiairlines.com

Customer Complaint Email: service@lanmeiairlines.com

Lanmei Airlines Official website : https://www.lanmeiairlines.com/

Fleet size: 06

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A321-200

Lanmei Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Lanmei Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Traveling while Pregnant Women in Lanmei Airlines

  • Passengers with pregnancy between 28 weeks and 34 weeks (inclusive) must submit a doctor’s medical certificate for flight

For more details: https://lanmeiairlines.com/lanmeiairlines2.0/default/menus/EN/experience/LMSpecialPassengers.html
Traveling with Pets

  • Pets are not permitted in Lanmei Airlines

Queries handled by Lanmei Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Lanmei Airlines office in Cambodia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Lanmei Airlines office in Cambodia: (click on the stars below)
